Unknown user Unknown job Unknown file Nothing has changed Saved Failed Nothing found Done Please remove source directory from FTP-Server! Otherwise duplicates may be created.
Create station entries: Will create for the asked time period one entry for each month, if it not already exists.
Contact: Stefan Br√∂nnimann
The password is necessary for all changes. The new password only, if you want to change it.
Leave the new password empty unless you want to (re)set it.
To create a new job put all files (using ftp) in a subdirectory of %1, reload this page and fill out the corresponding line in the following table. The subdirectory with the the data files will be copied under a new random name to %2. Therefore the target directory has to be writable for everybody. Please remove the source directory afterwards (not done automatically, since ftp is used inbetween). (Result) Files uploaded by the user are saved at %3
This may need some seconds.
The zip may be removed after one hour.
Creating a zip may need some seconds. The zip may be removed after an hour.
Except status all filters allow multiple selections.
Nothing selected has the same effect as all selected.
Depending on your browser: a) Click an marked item to deselect it b) Use the [ctrl]-key for multiple de-/selection
Click the id of a job to see the details including the files for download.
